edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.beans.loaders

?? BeanLoader<T>

  • ????:
    T - A type for the bean that will be loaded with this class.
    ???????:
    AdverseEventBeanLoader, AllergyBeanLoader, ApptBeanLoader, ApptTypeBeanLoader, DiagnosisBeanLoader, DrugInteractionBeanLoader, EmailBeanLoader, FamilyBeanLoader, HealthRecordsBeanLoader, HospitalBeanLoader, LabProcedureBeanLoader, LOINCBeanLoader, MedicationBeanLoader, MessageBeanLoader, OfficeVisitLoader, OperationalProfileLoader, PatientLoader, PersonnelLoader, PrescriptionBeanLoader, PrescriptionReportBeanLoader, ProcedureBeanLoader, ReferralBeanLoader, RemoteMonitoringDataBeanLoader, ReportRequestBeanLoader, SurveyLoader, SurveyResultBeanLoader, TransactionBeanLoader, VisitReminderReturnFormLoader

    public interface BeanLoader<T>
    This interface helps enforce the paradigm of what should be contained in a loader. The generic type specifies the type of bean that the loader is responsible for extacting from a result set.

    • ????

      ?? 
      ?????? ?????
      java.util.List<T> loadList(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
      Loads a list of the bean of type T from a result set.
      java.sql.PreparedStatement loadParameters(java.sql.PreparedStatement ps, T bean)
      Used for an insert or update, this method contains the instructions for mapping the fields within a bean of type T into a prepared statement which modifies the appropriate table.
      T loadSingle(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
      Contains the instructions for mapping the rows in this java.sql.ResultSet into beans of type .

    • ??????

      • loadList

        java.util.List<T> loadList(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Loads a list of the bean of type T from a result set. Typically makes iterated calls to loadSingle.
        ??:
        rs - The java.sql.ResultSet we are extracting.
        ??:
        A java.util.List where T is the type for this loader.
        ??:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • loadSingle

        T loadSingle(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Contains the instructions for mapping the rows in this java.sql.ResultSet into beans of type .
        ??:
        rs - The java.sql.ResultSet to be loaded.
        ??:
        A Bean of type T containing the loaded information, typically of the first (or next) item in the result set.
        ??:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • loadParameters

        java.sql.PreparedStatement loadParameters(java.sql.PreparedStatement ps,
                                        T bean)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Used for an insert or update, this method contains the instructions for mapping the fields within a bean of type T into a prepared statement which modifies the appropriate table.
        ??:
        ps - The prepared statement to be loaded.
        bean - The bean containing the data to be placed.
        ??:
        A prepared statement with the appropriately loaded parameters.
        ??:
        java.sql.SQLException
